post.text: "What we all saw and heard on Friday was Donald talking about women: what he thinks about women, what he does to women, and he has said that the video doesn't represent who he is—but I think it's clear to anyone who heard it that it represents exactly who he is." —Hillary

comment.author: Emily
comment.text: I am so proud of you. You show so much knowledge and experience, so much class. And SO much restraint.

replies.author: John
replies.text: Voting for hillory because of her experience, is like getting marriage advice from some one that has been married 20 time's

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: That makes no sense whatsoever. Please go away.

replies.author: Amos
replies.text: Oh it makes sense she's been a politician for 30 years, and now she suddenly is going to make these great changes. I don't think so she's replied lied to keep herself in the loop and keep her pockets full off your money, Donald own the other hand made his own money instead of stealing from hard working citizens
